EQUIPMENT_DETAILS.CATALOG_UNAVAILABLE_INLINE_MESSAGE: We don't have online catalogs for this make and/or model but we are happy to search the parts for you. Please fill in a research request.

EQUIPMENT_LIST.INLINE_MESSAGE: Don’t see the “Show parts” button on your machine? Probably the make or model is not listed in our online catalog. Please review if you entered the correct make and model or let us find your parts via a research request.
EQUIPMENT_LIST.ÏNLINE_MESSAGE_MOBILE: Don't see the “show parts” button on your machine? Refine your machine details to enable the quick link to show parts.

NEW_EQUIPMENT.SUBTITLE: Fill this form to create your new equipment

NEW_EQUIPMENT.INPUT_SUGGESTION_TEXT: Needs to be filled in to find the catalog of your machine
NEW_EQUIPMENT.MORE_DETAILS_SUBTITLE: Add more details to quickly find parts for your machine
NEW_EQUIPMENT.BANNER_ERROR: Please fill in all required fields to continue
NEW_EQUIPMENT.INPUT_INFO_MESSAGE: Your manual input cannot be automatically linked to “show parts”. Register your machine to make it easier to file a Research Request.
NEW_EQUIPMENT.UNKNOWN_VALUE_INFO_MESSAGE: We don't know this {{field}}, did you type it correctly?
NEW_EQUIPMENT.UNKNOWN_VALUE_HELP_TEXT: This {{field}} is not registered at TVH, we can’t create a quick link to show parts.

TITLE: My equipment
